ovdesc.p: This table contains the descriptions and codes for the various types of dividends and coupons handled by the system.

desc.p: This field may be expanded to allow the user to enter the Description of the DIV.COUP.TYPE in various languages. Each expansion of the field will correspond to a new language as defined in the Language table and will indicate to the user the Language in which the Description is to be entered.
3 to 35 type AA (alphanumeric, first character must be alpha) characters. Multilanguage field. (Mandatory input.)
Unique reference which identifies the Dividend/Coupon Type (DIV.COUP.TYPE).
1-5 type S (uppercase alpha or numeric) characters. (Mandatory input.)
Describes in abbreviated form the type of Dividend/Coupon (DIV.COUP.TYPE).

This field may be expanded to allow the user to enter the Description of the DIV.COUP.TYPE in various languages. Each expansion of the field will correspond to a new language as defined in the Language table and will indicate to the user the Language in which the Description is to be entered.
3 to 15 type SS (uppercase alpha or numeric, first character must be alpha) characters. Multilanguage field. (Mandatory input.)
